tag:lionkimbro@gmail.com,2021:entity-sch.TITLE: Schema (v1) for the Entity-Focal Data System
tag:lionkimbro@gmail.com,2021:entity-sch.DESCRIPTION: v1 schemas have a $UID, $SCHEMA that is schema:schema-v1, a TITLE, and a DESCRIPTION

tag:lionkimbro@gmail.com,2021:entity-sch.TITLE: Schema for Entity Packages (v1)
tag:lionkimbro@gmail.com,2021:entity-sch.DESCRIPTION: entity packages have a $SCHEMA, $UID self-declaration, package ENTITIES, and MOREINFO

tag:lionkimbro@gmail.com,2021:entity-sch.TITLE: Schema for Generic Entities (v1)
tag:lionkimbro@gmail.com,2021:entity-sch.DESCRIPTION: generic entities have $UID, $SCHEMA, and can choose whether or not to specify: LANG, TYPE, TITLE, HOOK, DESCRIPTION, TAGS, URL, CREATED, DATE, DATA, CONTENT, BINARY.  See https://github.com/LionKimbro/lions_internet_office/blob/main/2021/users/lion/entries/2021-09-13_the-generic-thing.md for further information.
